name: Age of Copper
description:
Beatem up game with vikings and with some informations about the copper used by scandinavians.

Done in less than 48h

ZERO code written - all done using visual scripting - Unity Bolt.

This is my first attempt doing any type of beatemup but had a lot of fun!

Controls: Arrow+Ctrl, Enter to skip titles etc.

Can be probably player on gamepad

3D Models bought from Synty Studio

Animations @ mixamo.com

Music done by AI @ https://ecrettmusic.com/play

Voiceover also done by AI @ https://replicastudios.com/

Between level graphics done using AI @ https://deepart.io
